title: Web Development Practical Competencies Enhancement: Customized Language Learning Support Program for Older Workers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device usage proficiency (smartphone utilization)
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can utilize work-related basic vocabulary and expressions with over 80% accuracy.
Learners are assessed on intermediate-level communication skills necessary for daily life (achieving over 70% in formative assessments).
Learners autonomously perform learning activities at least three times per week via a digital platform.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
